Features
Storage per user Storage for encrypted emails and calendars
Email addresses per user Create extra addresses in one account
Support for custom email domains Make your business easily recognizable
Brand your workspace Upload your business’ logo to customize your teams experience on Proton Mail Web
Stay organized with unlimited folders and labels
Correos electrónicos protegidos con contraseña Encrypt emails, even when sending outside of Proton Mail
Catch-all email address Never miss an email
Automatic email forwarding Forward emails to any account
Easily send emails to contact groups Easy communication with your business
SMTP submission Use printers, CRMs, or CMS systems to send emails through your Proton Mail
Use Proton Mail with Outlook, Thunderbird, or Apple Mail
Proton Sentinel Maximum security to protect your team using AI combined with human analysis
Calendars per user Create different calendars for different purposes
Compartir calendarios Gain efficiency with shared team calendars
See your colleagues’ availability Save time scheduling meetings
Apps for iOS, Android, Web, Windows, and Mac Manage your time on the go
Storage per user Storage for securing encrypted files on Proton Drive
Collaborate and share files Share via secure links
Back up data from your device Sync important files automatically
Set sharing links to expire or protect them with a password
Encrypted VPN connections per user Protect more devices at once
Countries Connect to faster servers in the locations you want
VPN speed
Medium Medium Highest
Secure Core servers for maximum privacy
Highest speeds with VPN Accelerator
DNS personalizado Third-party or self-hosted DNS server
LAN connections to easily access devices on your network
Política estricta de no registros We don’t log your web activity
Shared secure vaults Simplify team access and collaboration
Store unlimited logins, notes, and credit cards
Hide-my-email aliases Protect your online identity, share aliases instead of real email addresses
Unlimited Unlimited Unlimited
2FA built-in authenticator
Manage your organization
Enable two-factor authentication An extra layer of security
Manage user storage, access and permissions
Delegate admin permissions
Sign in as a user Access accounts for compliance or data retention
User credential and session management
Support
Easy data protection compliance, including GDPR and HIPAA
Priority support Your business is our top priority
Phone support (40+ users)
Guaranteed 99.95% uptime via our Service Level Agreement (SLA)
